S04vimkn_u:348: imam eva cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāyam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma:
S04vimkn_u:388: tatra yuṣmābhir evaṃrūpe kāye nirvidvirāga utpādayitavyas tathāgatakāye ca spṛhotpādayitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:389: Vkn 2.12 dharmakāyo hi mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyo dānanirjātaḥ śīlanirjātaḥ samādhinirjātaḥ prajñānirjāto vimuktinirjāto vimuktijñānadarśananirjātaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:394: abhijñāvidyānirjātaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya nirjātaḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparigrahanirjātaḥ satyanirjāto bhūtanirjāto 'pramādanirjātaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:395: apramāṇaśubhakarmanirjāto mārṣās tathāgatakāyas tatra yuṣmābhiḥ spṛhā kartavyā /
S04vimkn_u:396: sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakleśavyādhiprahāṇāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayitavyāni /
S04vimkn_u:397_0: Vkn 2.13 evaṃ vimalakīrtir licchavis tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ glānaparipṛcchakānāṃ
S04vimkn_u:397_1: tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yad bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04vimkn_u:399: Vkn 3.1 atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:401: na ca māṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samanvāharati,
S04vimkn_u:402: na ca me glānaparipṛcchakaṃ kaṃcit preṣayaty anukaṃpām upādāya /
S04vimkn_u:403: Vkn 3.2 samanvāhṛtaś ca bhagavatā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ /
S04vimkn_u:404: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:405: gaccha tvaṃ śāriputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:406: evam ukta āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:407: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:411: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavir yena tad vṛkṣamūlaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:412: Vkn 3.3 na bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ saṃlātavyaṃ yathā tvaṃ pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:413: api tu tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā traidhātuke na kāyaś cittaṃ vā saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:414: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā nirodhāc ca na vyuttiṣṭhasi sarveryāpatheṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:415: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā prāptilakṣaṇaṃ ca na vijahāsi pṛthagjanalakṣaṇeṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:416: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā te na cādhyātmaṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhaven na bahirdhopavicaret /
S04vimkn_u:417: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyaś ca na calasi saptatriṃśatsu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:418: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā saṃsārāvacarāṃś ca kleśān na prajahāsi nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaś ca bhavasi /
S04vimkn_u:419: ye bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ pratisaṃlīyante teṣāṃ bhagavān pratisaṃlayanam anujānāti /
S04vimkn_u:420: Vkn 3.4 so 'haṃ bhagavan etāṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm evābhūvam /
S04vimkn_u:421: na tasya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
S04vimkn_u:422: tan nāham utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:423: Vkn 3.5 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:424: gaccha tvaṃ maudgalyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:426: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:429: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamasmin vīthīmukhe gṛhapatibhyo dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:430: tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāmyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:431: Vkn 3.6 na bhadantamaudgalyāyana gṛhibhyo 'vadātavasanebhya evaṃ dharmo deśayitavyo yathā bhadanto deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:432: api tu tathā bhadantamaudgalyāyana dharmo deśayitavyo yathaiva sa dharmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:460: Vkn 3.7 īdṛśasya bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana dharmasya kīdṛśī deśanā /
S04vimkn_u:463: yatra bhadantamaudgalyāyana asamāropapadaṃ na tatra deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate /
S04vimkn_u:465: Vkn 3.8 evaṃ hi cittāvasthānena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:467: sudṛṣṭaprajñādarśanena mahākaruṇāmukhībhūtena mahāyānasaṃvarṇakena buddhekṛtajñena śuddhāśayena dharmaniruktividhijñena,
S04vimkn_u:469: Vkn 3.9 tena bhagavan tathā tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato gṛhapatiparsado 'ṣṭānāṃ gṛhapatiśatānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:471: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:472: Vkn 3.10 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:473: gaccha tvaṃ mahākāśyapa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:475: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:477: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan daridravīthyāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
S04vimkn_u:478: tatra māṃ vimalakirtir licchavir upasaṃkramyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:481: api tu bhadantamahākāśyapa dharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitena te bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:497: Vkn 3.13 yadi sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'ṣṭau ca mithyātvāni samatikrāmet,
S04vimkn_u:501: sarvabuddhān sarvāryāṃś ca pratipādya paścād ātmanā paribhuñjīta,
S04vimkn_u:502: tathā ca paribhuñjīta yathā na saṃkleśo na vigatakleśaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:505: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati te teṣāṃ nālpaphalaṃ na mahāphalaiḥ bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:506: na ca hānāya na viśeṣāya gacchet,
S04vimkn_u:509: Vkn 3.14 so 'haṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sarvabodhisatvān namasyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:512: tataḥ prabhṛti me na kaścit satvaḥ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā samādāpitapūrvo 'nyatra mahāyānāt /
S04vimkn_u:513: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:514: Vkn 3.15 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:515: gaccha tvaṃ subhūte vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:517: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:520: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
S04vimkn_u:522: tasya me vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ pātraṃ gṛhītvā praṇītena bhojanena pratipūryaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:523: Vkn 3.16 sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte āmiṣasamatayā sarvadharmasamatām anugataḥ sarvadharmasamatayā ca buddhadharmasamatām anugata eva,
S04vimkn_u:525: sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte na rāgadoṣamohaprahīṇo na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasasi /
S04vimkn_u:526: saced evam asy avikopya satkāyam ekāyanaṃ mārgam anugataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:527: na ca te 'vidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca samudghātitā na ca vidyāvimuktī utpādite /
S04vimkn_u:530: na ca te catvāry āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni na ca na dṛṣṭasatyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:534: Vkn 3.17 na ca te śāstā dṛṣṭo na dharmaḥ śruto na saṃghaḥ paryupāsitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:535: ye ca te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāśyapaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:541: te ca bhadantasya śāstāras tāṃś ca niśritya pravrajito yadgāminas te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadgāmy evāryasubhūtiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:542: Vkn 3.18 sarvadṛṣṭigateṣu cāryaman antargato na cāntamadhyaprāptaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:543: aṣṭākṣaṇasamavasaraṇaś cāsi na cāsi lakṣaṇam anuprāptaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:545: yā ca sarvasatvānām araṇā sā bhadantasyāpy araṇā,
S04vimkn_u:547: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati tāṃś ca vinipātayasi,
S04vimkn_u:548: sarvamāraiś ca te sārdham ekahastaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:557: Vkn 3.19 tasya me bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāndhakāraprāptā diśo 'bhūvan ḥ tat kim asmai nirdiśāmi,
S04vimkn_u:559: so 'haṃ tat pātram utsṛjya tato gṛhān niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
S04vimkn_u:564: yadi tathāgatanirmita evam ucyeta kaccit sa uttraset /
S04vimkn_u:571: evaṃ paṇḍitā akṣareṣu na sajjanti na tebhya uttrasyanti /
S04vimkn_u:573: sarvāṇi tāny akṣarāṇy anakṣarāṇi sthāpayitvā vimuktiṃ vimuktilakṣaṇāṃś ca sarvadharmān /
S04vimkn_u:574: Vkn 3.20 iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvayor devaputraśatayor virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham,
S04vimkn_u:575: pañcānāṃ ca devaputraśatānām ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:577: na cāsya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
S04vimkn_u:578: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:579: Vkn 3.21 atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:580: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:582: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:585: ekasmin samaye vanasyānyatamasmin pṛthivīpradeśa ādikarmikāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:586: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:587: Vkn 3.22 samāpadya bhadantapūrṇa eteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittaṃ vyavalokya dharmaṃ deśaya /
S04vimkn_u:589: jāniṣva tāvat kimāśayā ete bhikṣava iti /
S04vimkn_u:591: mā bhadantapūrṇa apratyavekṣyā satvendriyeṣu prādeśikendriyatvam upasaṃhārṣīḥ /
S04vimkn_u:597: api bhadantapūrṇa sarve hy ete bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitā amuṣitabodhicittāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:600: jātyandhā iva me śrāvakāḥ pratibhānti satvendriyavimātratājñāne /
S04vimkn_u:601: Vkn 3.23 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:602: yathā te bhikṣavo 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmaraṇti sma /
S04vimkn_u:605: te tasya satpuruṣasya pādau śirobhiḥ praṇamya tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā,
S04vimkn_u:606: teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yathāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛttā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04vimkn_u:607: Vkn 3.24 tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:608: Vkn 3.25 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kātyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:609: gaccha tvaṃ kātyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:611: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:616: yad idam anityārthaṃ duḥkhārtham anātmārthaṃ śāntārtham /
S04vimkn_u:617: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:618: Vkn 3.26 mā bhadantakātyāyana sapracārām utpādabhaṅgayuktāṃ dharmatāṃ nirdiśa /
S04vimkn_u:619: yo bhadantamahākātyāyana atyantatayā na jāto na janiṣyati notpanno na niruddho na nirotsyate 'yam anityārthaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:625: Vkn 3.27 asmin khalu punar nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
S04vimkn_u:626: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:627: Vkn 3.28 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam aniruddham āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:628: gaccha tvam aniruddha vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:630: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:634: tatra śubhavyūho nāma brahmā daśabhir brahmasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ pradeśam avabhāsya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte sthitvā mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:635: kiyad āyuṣmān aniruddho divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
S04vimkn_u:637: ahaṃ mārṣa imaṃ triṃ sāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner buddhakṣetraṃ tad yathāpi nāma karatale nyastam āmalakaphalam evaṃ paśyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:638: Vkn 3.30 iyaṃ ca kathā pravṛttā vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:639: upasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:640: kiṃ bhadantāniruddha divyaṃ cakṣur abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam utānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam /
S04vimkn_u:641: yady abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ tad bāhyaiḥ pañcābhijñaiḥ samam,
S04vimkn_u:642: athānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'saṃskṛtas tena na śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
S04vimkn_u:645: Vkn 3.31 sa ca brahmā tasya satpuruṣasyemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptas taṃ namaskṛtyaitad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:647: āha: buddhā bhagavanto loke divyacakṣuṣo ye samāhitāvasthāṃ ca na vijahati sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04vimkn_u:649: Vkn 3.32 atha sa brahmemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā daśasahasraparivāro 'dhyāśayenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:650: sa māṃ vanditvā taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivādya tatraivāntarhitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:652: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:653: Vkn 3.33 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam upālim āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:654: gaccha tvam upāle vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:656: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:661: tau yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkrāmya mām etad avocatām /
S04vimkn_u:663: tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantam upasaṃkramituṃ notsahāvahe /
S04vimkn_u:664: utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāvayoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
S04vimkn_u:665: Vkn 3.34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:666: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:670: na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsaṃkrānto nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S04vimkn_u:672: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā cittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante /
S04vimkn_u:673: cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S04vimkn_u:677: yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam,
S04vimkn_u:691: ye tv evaṃ jānanti te vinayadharā ity ucyante /
S04vimkn_u:693: Vkn 3.36 atha tau bhikṣu etad avocatām:
S04vimkn_u:695: na tv ayaṃ bhadantopālir yo bhagavatā vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:699: tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kaścic chrāvako vā bodhisatvo vā,
S04vimkn_u:702: Vkn 3.37 atha tau bhikṣū vinītakaukṛtyāv adhyāśayena tatraivānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditavantau,
S04vimkn_u:705: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:706: Vkn 3.38 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:707: gaccha tvaṃ rāhula vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:709: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:712: ekasmin samaye saṃbahulā licchavikumārakā yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:713: tvaṃ rāhula tasya bhagavataḥ putraś cakravartirājyam utsṛjya pravrajitaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:715: teṣām ahaṃ yathārūpaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdiśāmi,
S04vimkn_u:718: Vkn 3.39 na bhadantarāhula evaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdeṣṭavyā yathā tvaṃ nirdiśasi /
S04vimkn_u:748: Vkn 3.40 pravrajata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
S04vimkn_u:755: sa tān āha: utpādayata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam /

S04vimkn_u:794: Vkn 3.45 api tu bhadantānanda dharmakāyās tathāgatā nāmiṣakāyāḥ /

S04vimkn_u:799: Vkn 3.46 tasya me bhagavan mahadapatrāpyaṃ jātam /

S04vimkn_u:807: Vkn 3.47 īdṛśā bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaveḥ praśnavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ /

S04vimkn_u:812: gaccha tvaṃ maitreya vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /

S04vimkn_u:1021: Vkn 3.65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat: āgacchata /
S04vimkn_u:1024: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye /

S04vimkn_u:1034: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ:
S04vimkn_u:1036: Vkn 3.66 āha: asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham /
S04vimkn_u:1039: tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante /

S04vimkn_u:1110: Vkn 3.75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi /

S04vimkn_u:1131: Vkn 4.1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:

S04vimkn_u:1273: Vkn 4.12 tena dharmasaṃjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /

S04vimkn_u:1318: evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet,
S04vimkn_u:1321: evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
S04vimkn_u:1323: yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti /
S04vimkn_u:1327: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1328: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1331: so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate /
S04vimkn_u:1332: sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum /
S04vimkn_u:1333: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti nādaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04vimkn_u:1334: yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam,
S04vimkn_u:1357: yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighaprahīṇasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau pariṇāmitas tasya cāparāmarśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1359: Vkn 4.18 tatra mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvenaivam ime dharmā nidhyapayitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1360: yatl kāyasya cittasya ca vyādheś cānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmapratyavekṣaṇā,
S04vimkn_u:1366: punar aparaṃ yat kāyasya vyādheś cittasya cānyonyaparāparatāṃ na nirnavatāniḥpurāṇatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S04vimkn_u:1368: yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati,
S04vimkn_u:1370: Vkn 4.19 evaṃ hi mañjuśriḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1371: na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1373: yadi hy anidhyaptau tiṣṭhed bāladharma eṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1379: yat saṃsāragocaraś ca na ca kleśagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1385: yat sarvajñajñānaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cākāle jñānaprāptigocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1387: yac catuḥsatyajñānagocaraś ca na cākāle satyaprativedhagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1391: yad ajātipratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na ca niyāmāvakrāntigocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1395: yat sarvasatvasaṃgaṇikāgocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1397: yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kāyacittakṣayaniśrayagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1399: yat traidhātukagocaraś ca na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1411: yat ṣaḍanusmṛtigocaraś ca na ca sarvāsravakṣayagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1413: yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1417: yac caturapramāṇagocaraś ca na ca brahmalokopapattisparśanagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1419: yad dhyānasamādhisamāpattigocaraś ca na ca samādhisamāpattivaśenopapattigocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1421: yat smṛtyupasthānagocaraś ca na ca kāyavedanācittadharmātyarthagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1423: yat samyakprahāṇagocaraś ca na ca kuśalākuśaladvayopalambhagocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1447: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni // //
S04vimkn_u:1453: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1456: Vkn 5.2 āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmarthiko bhavati,
S04vimkn_u:1466: Vkn 5.3 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthikaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1467: nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko na mārgabhāvanārthiko bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:1470: tatra yaḥ prapañcayati ḥ duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S04vimkn_u:1478: tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi,
S04vimkn_u:1486: ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā,
S04vimkn_u:1509: tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1510: iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
S04vimkn_u:1511: Vkn 5.6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:1512: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetracārikāṃ carasi /
S04vimkn_u:1513: tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛṣṭāni /
S04vimkn_u:1514: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1515: asti kulaputra pūrve digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1516: tatra merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:1521: merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvagunopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:1522: Vkn 5.7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma /
S04vimkn_u:1524: yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupradīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni /
S04vimkn_u:1525: tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca /
S04vimkn_u:1526: tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakirter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:1527: tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ saṃdṛśyate,
S04vimkn_u:1529: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04vimkn_u:1532: sarve te tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:1533: Vkn 5.8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1534: niṣida tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1535: tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1536: atha ye 'bhijñāpratilabdhā bodhisatvās te dvācatvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasram ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nisīdanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:1537: ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
S04vimkn_u:1538: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:1540: āha: na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhitāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:1541: āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kuru /
S04vimkn_u:1543: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:1544: te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
S04vimkn_u:1545: Vkn 5.9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakirtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:1546: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam uccāny evaṃ pragṛhītāni vicitrāṇi /
S04vimkn_u:1547: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04vimkn_u:1552: tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:1554: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1555: yatrācintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1559: na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1560: anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyuḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣṭam /
S04vimkn_u:1561: ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya viṣayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1562: Vkn 5.11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1563: na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1564: na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1566: na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1567: Vkn 5.12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1568: na ca satvā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1573: Vkn 5.13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1575: tatrācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo 'pramāṇasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1576: saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1577: tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran I saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran /
S04vimkn_u:1578: Vkn 5.14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre saṃdarśayati /
S04vimkn_u:1579: sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāyikayarddhyā kramet /
S04vimkn_u:1582: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante,
S04vimkn_u:1584: yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāni ca,
S04vimkn_u:1586: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti,
S04vimkn_u:1589: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1590: Vkn 5.15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddahyante kalpoddāhena,
S04vimkn_u:1591: tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1592: yac ca tena karma kartavyaṃ bhavet,
S04vimkn_u:1594: yac cāvastād gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram,
S04vimkn_u:1595: tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet /
S04vimkn_u:1596: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1597: Vkn 5.16 evam acṃtyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet /
S04vimkn_u:1598: Vkn 5.17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1599: tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan,
S04vimkn_u:1601: yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04vimkn_u:1603: Vkn 5.18 ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ yatkiṃcinmātro viṣayāvatāranirdeśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1604: api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśesaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam,
S04vimkn_u:1606: Vkn 5.19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1607: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1608: na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet /
S04vimkn_u:1609: evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1610: ko nāma vidvān imam acintyaṃ vimokṣaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet /
S04vimkn_u:1611: tat kiṃ nu bhūyaḥ kariṣyāmo 'tyantopahatendriyā dagdhavinaṣṭānīva bījāny abhājanībhūtā iha mahāyāne /
S04vimkn_u:1612: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā rudadbhis trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur vijñāpayitavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1613: sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pramuditair imam acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvā mūrdhnā saṃpratyetavyaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1616: imaṃ nirdeśaṃ nirdiśataḥ sthavirasya mahākāśyapasya dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:1617: Vkn 5.20 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ mahākāśyapam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:1618: yāvanto bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mārā māratvaṃ kārayanti,
S04vimkn_u:1619: sarve te yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipācanāya māratvaṃ kārayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1620_0: yāvadbhir bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisatvā yācanakair
S04vimkn_u:1620_1: yācyante hastapādān vā karṇanāsaṃ vā śoṇitaṃ snāyuṃ vāsthimajjānaṃ vā netrāṇi vottamāṅgāni
S04vimkn_u:1620_2: śirāṃsi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni vā rājyarāṣṭrajanapadān vā bhāryāputraduhitṝr vā dāsadāsīr
S04vimkn_u:1622: sarve te yācanakā yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyenemāṃ dṛḍhādhyāśayatāṃ darśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1624: ugratapaso hi bhadantamahākāśyapa bodhisatvās ta evaṃ darśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1626: tadyathāpi nāma bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti khadyotakasya sūryamaṇḍalaprabhām abhibhavitum /
S04vimkn_u:1627: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti prākṛtasya janasya bodhisatvenānavakāśakṛtasyopasaṃkramituṃ yācituṃ vā /
S04vimkn_u:1628: tadyathā bhadantamahākāśyapa yo hastināgasya prahāro na sa śakyo gardabhena soḍhum /
S04vimkn_u:1629: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śakyam abodhisatvena bodhisatvasyotpīḍanaṃ soḍhum /
S04vimkn_u:1633: Vkn 6.1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1635: āha: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ vijñapuruṣa udakacandram avekṣeta,
S04vimkn_u:1637: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalam ālokayet,
S04vimkn_u:1641: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ māyākāro māyākāranirmitaṃ puruṣam avekṣeta,
S04vimkn_u:1700: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1701: Vkn 6.2 āha: yadi kulaputraivaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1702: kathaṃ punar asya mahāmaitrī bhavati sarvasatveṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1703: āha: yadā mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatva evaṃ pratyavekṣate,
S04vimkn_u:1704: mayā hy eṣāṃ satvānām evaṃ dharmaparijñāyai dharmo deśayitavya iti,
S04vimkn_u:1736: Vkn 6.3 āha: katarā punar asya mahākaruṇā /
S04vimkn_u:1737: āha: yat kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvebhya utsṛjati /
S04vimkn_u:1744: āha: saṃsārabhayabhītena mañjuśriḥ bodhisatvena buddhamāhātmyaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1749: Vkn 6.5 āha: sarvasatvapramokṣaṃ kartukāmena kiṃ kartavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1751: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena kathaṃ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1752: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena yoniśaḥ prayuktena bhavitavyam /

S04vimkn_u:2270: yā kāyasyānabhisaṃskāratā tallakṣaṇaiva vāganabhisaṃskāratā tallakṣaṇaiva mano'nabhisaṃskāratā /
S04vimkn_u:2277: yā ca puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na tatra puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2293: tathā hi nirodhasamāpannasya na tamo na prakāśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2298: yasya na nirvāṇe 'bhiratir na saṃsāre 'nabhiratir idam advayam /
S04vimkn_u:2301: yo 'tyantam evābaddhaḥ sa kiṃ mokṣaṃ paryeṣiṣyate /
S04vimkn_u:2302: abaddho 'mukto bhikṣur na ratim utpādayati nāratim ayam advayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2306: asamudācārasthitasya na mārgasaṃjñā bhavati na kumārgasaṃjñā /
S04vimkn_u:2307: saṃjñāparijñātāvino hi dvaye buddhir nākrāmaty ayam asyādvayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2317: yatra ca na paśyanā na vipaśyanāyam advayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2318: Vkn 8.32 ity evaṃ te bodhisatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśya mañjuśriyam kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2322: api tu yāvad yuṣmābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ sarvam etad dvayam /
S04vimkn_u:2323: ekanirdeśaṃ sthāpayitvā yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anudāhāro 'pravyāhāro 'nudīranākīrtanānabhilapanam aprajñapanam ayam advayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2324: Vkn 8.33 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2328: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrter licchaveḥ sādhukāram adāt:
S04vimkn_u:2329: sādhu sādhu kulaputra ayaṃ bodhisatvānām advayadharmamukhapraveśo yatra nākṣararutaravitavijñaptipracāraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2330: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ bodhisatvasahasrāṇām advayadharmamukhapraveśād anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt // //
S04vimkn_u:2336: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2337: ye te bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatenāṣṭau vimokṣā ākhyātās tair vimokṣair vihara /
S04vimkn_u:2338: tvaṃ mā āmiṣamrakṣitayā saṃtatyā dharmaṃ śrauṣīḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2339: api tu khalu punar bhadantaśāriputra muhūrtam āgamayasva,
S04vimkn_u:2341: Vkn 9.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhisamāpannaḥ tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān /
S04vimkn_u:2342_0: yad ūrdhve digbhāga ito buddhakṣetrād dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy
S04vimkn_u:2342_1: atikramya sarvagandhasugandhaṃ nāma lokadhātuṃ teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇām upadarśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2343: tatra gandhottamakūṭo nāma tathāgata etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:2344: tatra ca lokadhātau yādṛśā daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu divyā mānuṣyakāś ca gandhā vānti /
S04vimkn_u:2345: te tatra lokadhātau vṛkṣebhyo viśiṣṭatamā gandhā vānti /
S04vimkn_u:2346: tatra lokadhātau nāsti śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nāmadheyam api /
S04vimkn_u:2348: sa tebhyo gandhottamakūṭas tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2351: yaṃ ca te bodhisatvā āhāram āharanti tasya bhojanasya yo gandhaḥ so 'pramāṇāl lokadhātūn spharati /
S04vimkn_u:2352: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān gandhottamakūṭas tathāgato bhaktāya niṣaṇṇo 'bhut sārdhaṃ tair bodhisatvaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2353: tatra gandhavyuhāhārā nāma devaputrā mahāyānasaṃprasthitās tasya bhagavatas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānām upasthānaparicaryāyā udyuktāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2354: tatra sā sarvā parṣat taṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān bhaktāgraniṣaṇnān /
S04vimkn_u:2355: Vkn 9.3 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tān sarvān bodhisatvān āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2356: ko yuṣmākaṃ satpuruṣāḥ utsahate 'to buddhakṣetrād bhojanam ānetum /
S04vimkn_u:2358: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2359: na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ paryapatrapasa īdṛśyā parṣadā /
S04vimkn_u:2360: āha: nanūktaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenāśikṣito na paribhavitavya iti /
S04vimkn_u:2361: Vkn 9.4 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir anuttiṣṭhann etataḥ śayanāt puratas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04vimkn_u:2362: suvarṇavarṇena kāyena lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtena tasya tādṛśo rūpāvabhāso 'bhūd yena sā sarvā parṣad dhyāmīkṛtā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:2363: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2364: gaccha kulaputra ūrdhaṃdigbhāge dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya sarvagandhasugandho nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2367_0: tatra gatvā madvacanāt tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvaivaṃ vada ḥ vimalakīrtir
S04vimkn_u:2367_1: licchavir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'lpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty
S04vimkn_u:2367_2: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghutthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:2368: evaṃ ca vadati ḥ dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ yat sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2369: eṣāṃ ca hīnādhimuktikanāṃ satvānam udārāṃ matiṃ rocayiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2371: Vkn 9.5 atha sa nirmito bodhisatvo vimalakīrter licchaveḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ purata ūrdhamukhaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:2372: na cainaṃ te bodhisatvāḥ paśyanti gacchantam /
S04vimkn_u:2373: atha sa nirmito bodhisatvas taṃ sarvagandhasugandhaṃ lokadhātum anuprāptaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2374: sa tatra bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2375: vimalakīrtir bhagavan bodhisatvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate /
S04vimkn_u:2376: alpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:2377: sa ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2378: dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ yad idaṃ sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2379: teṣāṃ hīnādhimuktānāṃ satvānām udāreṣu buddhadharmeṣu matiṃ rocayiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2380: bhagavataś ca nāmadheyaṃ vaistārikaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2381: Vkn 9.6 atha khalu ye tasya bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre bodhisatvās te vismitās taṃ bhagavantaṃ gandhottamakūṭaṃ tathāgatam evam āhuḥ:
S04vimkn_u:2385: evaṃ te bodhisatvās taṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2386: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2387: asti kulaputrāḥ adhodigbhāga ito buddhakṣetrād dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya saho lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2388: tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati hīnādhimuktikānāṃ satvānāṃ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre /
S04vimkn_u:2389: tatra vimalakīrtir nāma bodhisatvo 'cintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2390: tenaiṣa nirmito bodhisatvo 'nupreṣito mama nāmadheyaparikīrtanāyāsya ca lokadhātor varṇasaṃprakāśanāya teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ kuśalamūlottānatāyai /
S04vimkn_u:2391: Vkn 9.7 atha te bodhisatvā evam āhuḥ:
S04vimkn_u:2392: kiyan mahātmā sa bhagavan bodhisatvo yasyāyaṃ nirmita evam ṛddhibalavaiśāradyaprāptaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2394: tathā mahātmā sa bodhisatvo yat sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu nirmitān preṣayati /
S04vimkn_u:2395: te ca nirmitā buddhakṛtyena satvānāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:2396: Vkn 9.8 atha sa bhagavān gandhottamakūṭas tathāgataḥ sarvagandhasamīhite bhājane taṃ sarvagandhaparivāsitaṃ bhojanaṃ tasmai bodhisatvāya prādāt /
S04vimkn_u:2398: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan taṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāyaitaṃ ca vimalakīrtiṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān darśanāya /
S04vimkn_u:2401: api tu gandhān kulaputrāḥ pratisaṃhṛtya taṃ lokadhātuṃ praviśata,
S04vimkn_u:2404: mā te sahe lokadhātau satvā madgubhūtā bhaveyuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2409: satvaparipākāya tu buddhā bhagavanto na sarvaṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:2410_0: Vkn 9.9 atha nirmito bodhisatvas tad bhojanam ādāya sārdhaṃ tair navatyā bodhisatvasahasrair
S04vimkn_u:2410_1: buddhānubhāvena vimalakīrtyadhiṣṭhānena ca tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena sarvagandhasugandhe
S04vimkn_u:2410_2: lokadhātāv antarhito vimalakīrter licchaver gṛhe pratyaṣṭhāt /
S04vimkn_u:2411: Vkn 9.10 tatra vimalakirtir navatisiṃhāsanasahasrāṇy adhitiṣṭhati yādṛśāny eva tāni prathamakāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:2413: sa ca nirmitas tad bhojanaparipūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ vimalakīrter licchaver upanāmayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:2414: tasya bhojanasya gandhena sarvā vaiśālī mahānagarī nirdhūpitābhūd yāvat sāhasro lokadhātuḥ sugandhagandhīkṛto 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2415_0: tatra vaiśālakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ somacchatraś ca nāma licchavīnām adhipatis taṃ
S04vimkn_u:2416: tenaiva ca bhojanagandhena bhūmāvacarā devaputrāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃcoditā vimalakīrter licchaver gṛham upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan /
S04vimkn_u:2417: Vkn 9.11 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputraṃ tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2421: Vkn 9.12 tatra keṣāṃcic chrāvakāṇām etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:2422: ita evaṃ parīttād bhojanāt katham iyam īdṛśī parṣat paribhokṣyata iti /
S04vimkn_u:2423: tān sa nirmito bodhisatvaḥ śrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2424: mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ svaprajñāpuṇyais tathāgataprajñāpuṇyāni samīkārṣṭa /
S04vimkn_u:2426: na tv evāsya bhojanasya kaścit parikṣayaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2427: sacet sarvasatvā api sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ kalpaṃ paribhuñjīran,
S04vimkn_u:2430: akṣayaśīlasamādhiprajñānirjātasyedaṃ tathāgatasya pātrāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ naitac chakyaṃ kṣapayitum /
S04vimkn_u:2431: Vkn 9.13 atha tato bhojanāt sarvā sā parṣat tṛptā kṛtā /
S04vimkn_u:2433: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiḥ śakrabrahmalokapālais tadanyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktam,
S04vimkn_u:2434: teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ kāye 'vakrāntaṃ yādṛśaṃ sarvasukhapratimaṇḍite lokadhātau bodhisatvānāṃ sukham /
S04vimkn_u:2435: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2436: tadyathāpi nāma tasminn eva sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2437: Vkn 9.14 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir jānann eva tān bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatān bodhisatvān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2441: tenaiva gandhena te bodhisatvā vinayaṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2442: yatra yatraiva gandhavṛkṣe te bodhisatvā niṣīdanti,
S04vimkn_u:2443_0: tatas tatas tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti yat samanantarāghrāte gandhe sarvabodhisatvaguṇākaraṃ
S04vimkn_u:2443_1: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhante yasya samādheḥ samanantarapratilambhāt sarveṣāṃ bodhisatvaguṇā jāyante /
S04vimkn_u:2444: Vkn 9.15 atha te bodhisatvā vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:2445: iha punar bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ kīdṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ prakāśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2447: teṣāṃ durdamānāṃ satvānāṃ khaṭuṅkadurdamadamathakathām eva prakāśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2505: ity evam anekadharmaparibhāṣaṇatayā khaṭuṅkāśvasadṛśacittāḥ satvā avasthāpyante /
S04vimkn_u:2506: tadyathā khaṭuṅko hayo gajo vā yāvan marmavedhena damathaṃ gacchati,
S04vimkn_u:2507: evam eveha durdamāḥ khaṭuṅkāḥ satvās te sarvaduḥkhaparibhāṣaṇakathābhir damathaṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2509: āścaryaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner yatra hi nāma pratisaṃhṛtya buddhamāhātmyaṃ daridralūhatayā khaṭuṅkān satvān vinayati /
S04vimkn_u:2510: ye 'pi bodhisatvā ihaivaṃ pratikaṣṭe buddhakṣetre prativasanti teṣām apy acintyā mahākaruṇā /
S04vimkn_u:2512: evam eva satpuruṣāḥ tathaitad yathā vadatha /
S04vimkn_u:2515: te bahutaram iha lokadhātāv ekajanmanā kariṣyanti satvārtham /
S04vimkn_u:2516: na tv eva tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau kalpasahasreṇa satvārthaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2518: iha hi satpuruṣāḥ sahe lokadhātau daśa kuśaloccayā dharmāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2532: imān daśa kuśaloccayān dharmān pratigṛhṇanti ye tadanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na saṃvidyante /
S04vimkn_u:2534: katamair dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo 'kṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvā pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2536: aṣṭābhiḥ kulaputraḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2538: yad uta sarvasatvānāṃ mayā hitaṃ kartavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2539: na caiṣāṃ sakāśāt kiṃcid dhitaṃ paryeṣitavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2540: sarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ cānenotsoḍhavyaṃ sarvaṃ cānena kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānām utsraṣṭavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2543: aśrutānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ śrutānāṃ ca śravaṇād apratikṣepaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2546: ebhir aṣṭābhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2547_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūtas tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāyāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2547_1: tathā dharmaṃ deśayato yathā paripūrṇasya prāṇisahasrasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni,
S04vimkn_u:2550: Vkn 10.1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata āmrapālīvane dharmaṃ deśayataḥ sa maṇḍalamāḍo vipulaś ca vistīrṇaś ca saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2551: sā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:2553: kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yad idam āmrapālīvanam evaṃ vistīrṇaṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:2555: eṣa ānanda vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūto mahatyā parṣadā parivṛtau tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2556: Vkn 10.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2558: ime ca mahāsatvās tathāgataṃ drakṣyanti vandiṣyante ca /
S04vimkn_u:2559: āha: gacchāma kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S04vimkn_u:2560: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tādṛśam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S04vimkn_u:2561: yathā tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ sārdhaṃ taiḥ siṃhāsanair dakṣiṇe pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:2562: upasaṃkramya tāṃ parṣadaṃ dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:2563: atha ye te bodhisatvā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2564: te cānye ca tebhyaḥ siṃhāsanebhyo 'vatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:2565: evaṃ śakrabrahmalokapālā devaputrāś ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /

S04vimkn_u:2569: Vkn 10.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2570: dṛṣṭaṃ te śāriputra eṣām agrasatvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ vikrīḍitam /
S04vimkn_u:2574: āha: acintyā saṃjñā me bhagavan tatrodapadyata yathā cintayituṃ tulayituṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknomi tādṛśīṃ teṣām acintyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:2575: Vkn 10.4 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2578: āha: eṣām eva ānanda bodhisatvānāṃ sarvaromakūpebhyo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2580: asmākam apy āyuṣmann ānanda sarvaromakūpebhya īdṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /

S04vimkn_u:2584: Vkn 10.5 athāyuṣmān ānando vimalakīrtiṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2586: āha: yāvad etad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2587: ānanda āha: kiyaccireṇa punar etad bhojanaṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2591: Vkn 10.6 yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām avakrāntaniyāmānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2592: yaiḥ punar avakrāntaniyāmair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāparimuktacittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2593: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānām pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2594: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2595: yaiḥ punaḥ pratilabdhakṣāntikair bhuktaṃ teṣām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2596: Vkn 10.7 tadyathāpi nāma bhadantānanda svādur nāma bhaiṣajyam,
S04vimkn_u:2597: tat tāvat kauṣṭhagataṃ na pariṇamati yāvan na sarvagataṃ viṣam apagataṃ bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2599: evam eva bhadantānanda tāvad eva tad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhavati yāvat sarvakleśaviṣaṃ na nirviṣaṃ bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2603: āha: evam etad ānanda evam etad yathā vadasi /

S04vimkn_u:2605: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhivṛkṣo buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2606: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu tathāgatalakṣaṇarūpadarśanaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2611: santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni pariśuddhāni yatrānudāhāratāpravyāhāratānirdeśatānabhilāpyatā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2612: Vkn 10.10 na kaścid ānanda īryāpatho na kaścid upabhogo yo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satvavinayāya buddhakṛtyaṃ na karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2613: ye cema ānanda catvāro mārāś caturāśītiś ca kleśamukhaśatasahasrāṇi yaiḥ satvāḥ saṃkliśyante,
S04vimkn_u:2614: sarvais tair buddhā bhagavanto buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
S04vimkn_u:2615_0: Vkn 10.11 idam ānanda sarvabuddhadharmapraveśaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ yatra yatra dharmamukhe
S04vimkn_u:2615_1: praviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ sarvodāravyūhaguṇasamanvāgateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu nāvalīyate nāvanamati /

S04vimkn_u:2619: Vkn 10.12 tadyathā ānanda bhavati buddhakṣetrāṇām aparāparaguṇanānātvam,
S04vimkn_u:2621: evam eva ānanda bhavati tathāgatānaṃ rupakāyanānātvam,
S04vimkn_u:2623_0: Vkn 10.13 samā hy ānanda sarvabuddhā rūpeṇa varṇena tejasā vapuṣā lakṣaṇaiḥ kulamāhātmyena
S04vimkn_u:2623_1: śīlena samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanena balair vaiśāradyair buddhadharmair
S04vimkn_u:2623_2: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā hitaiṣitayeryayā caryayā pratipadāyuḥpramāṇena dharmadeśanayā
S04vimkn_u:2624: tenocyate samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2625: eṣām ānanda trayāṇāṃ padānāṃ yo 'rthavistarapadavibhaṅgaḥ sa tvayā kalpasthitikenāpi na sukaraḥ paryavāptum /
S04vimkn_u:2626: trisāhasraparyāpannā apy ānanda satvās tvatsadṛśā bhaveyur agrā bahuśrutānāṃ smṛtidhāriṇīpratilabdhānām,

S04vimkn_u:2628: yad idaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2631: Vkn 10.14 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2632: adyāgreṇāhaṃ bhagavan na bhūyo 'gro bahuśrutānām ity ātmānaṃ pratijñāsyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:2636: śrāvakān saṃdhāya tvaṃ mayā ānanda agro bahuśrutānāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2640: śakyo hy ānanda sarvasāgarāṇāṃ gādhaḥ pramātum,
S04vimkn_u:2641: na tv eva śakyo bodhisatvānāṃ prajñājñānasmṛtidhāraṇīpratibhānasya gādhaḥ pramātum /
S04vimkn_u:2644: ya ima ānanda vimalakīrtinā licchavinaikapūrvabhakte vyūhāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2645: te sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair ṛddhiprāptaiḥ sarvarddhivikurvitaprātihāryaiḥ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi na śakyāḥ saṃdarśayitum /
S04vimkn_u:2646: Vkn 10.15 atha ye te bodhisatvā bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor agataḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2649: pratiniḥsṛjāmo vayaṃ bhagavan tān manasikārān yair asmābhir iha buddhakṣetre hīnasaṃjñotpāditā /
S04vimkn_u:2651: acintyo hi bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaviṣayaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2652: upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya yathā yathecchanti tathā tathā kṣetravyūhān ādarśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:2653: dehi bhagavan asmabhyaṃ dharmaprābhṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau gatā bhagavantam anusmarema /
S04vimkn_u:2655: asti kulaputrāḥ kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2660: tad bodhisatvena saṃskṛtaṃ ca na kṣapayitavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2713: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ etaddharmādhimukto bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2714: Vkn 10.18 kathaṃ punar asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate /
S04vimkn_u:2745: riktam iti ca tuccham iti cāsārakam iti cāsvāmikam iti cāniketam iti ca pratyavekṣate,
S04vimkn_u:2747: cātucchajñānaś ca paripūrṇasaṃkalpaś ca svayambhūjñānābhiṣiktaś ca svayambhūjñāne cābhiyukto nītārtho buddhavaṃśe pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2748: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ evaṃ dharmādhimukto bodhisatvo 'saṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2783: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati,
S04vimkn_u:2785: ayam ucyate kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /

S04vimkn_u:2787_1: pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānām asya
S04vimkn_u:2787_2: dharmaparyāyasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvacūrṇagandhadhupavyūhaiḥ
S04vimkn_u:2787_3: puṣpaiś ca jānumātraṃ saṃchādya bhagavataś ca parṣanmaṇḍalam abhikīrtiṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ
S04vimkn_u:2787_4: pādau śirobhir vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtyodānam udānayanta iha buddhakṣetre
S04vimkn_u:2787_5: 'ntarhitās tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau pratyupasthitāḥ // //
S04vimkn_u:2789: Vkn 11.1 atha khalu bhagavān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2790: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatasya darśanakāmo bhavasi,
S04vimkn_u:2792: evam ukte vimalakīrtir licchavir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2803: ṣaḍāyatanānutpannaṃ cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaṃ śrotrapathasamatikrāntaṃ ghrāṇapathasamatikrāntaṃ jihvāpathasamatikrāntaṃ kāyapathasamatikrāntaṃ manaḥpathasamatikrāntam,
S04vimkn_u:2814: na lakṣyate na saṃlakṣyate na vilakṣyate,
S04vimkn_u:2878: Vkn 11.2 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2879: katamasmād bhagavan buddhakṣetrāc cyutau vimalakīrtiḥ kulaputra idaṃ buddhakṣetram āgataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2881: etam eva tvaṃ śāriputra satpuruṣaṃ paripṛccha ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
S04vimkn_u:2882: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2886: kaccit tasya dharmasya cyutir upapattir vā /
S04vimkn_u:2887: āha: na tasya dharmasya kācic cyutir upapattir vā /
S04vimkn_u:2888: āha: evam acyutikānām anutpattikānāṃ bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /

S04vimkn_u:2891: āha: na kulaputra nirmitasya cyutir nopapattiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2893: āha: nanu bhadantaśāriputra nirmitasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena nirdiṣṭāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2895: āha: nirmitasvabhāveṣu bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmeṣu ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
S04vimkn_u:2902: Vkn 11.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2903: akṣobhyasya śāriputra tathāgatasya sakāśād āgata eṣa kulaputro 'bhiratyā Iokadhātoḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2904: āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad eṣa satpuruṣas tāvatpariśuddhād buddhakṣetrād āgatyehaivaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭe buddhakṣetre 'bhiramate /
S04vimkn_u:2906: tat kiṃ manyase bhadantaśāriputra api nu sūryaraśmayo 'ndhakāreṇa sārdhaṃ ramante /
S04vimkn_u:2910: āha: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ punaḥ sūryo jambūdvīpa udayate /
S04vimkn_u:2912: āha: evam eva śāriputra saṃcintya bodhisatvā apariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante satvānāṃ pariśodhanāya /
S04vimkn_u:2915: Vkn 11.4 atha sā sarvā parṣat paritṛṣitābhut:
S04vimkn_u:2916: paśyema vayaṃ tam abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgataṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvāṃs tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān /
S04vimkn_u:2917: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ parṣadaś cetasa cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2918: darśaya kulaputra asyāḥ parṣadas tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam /
S04vimkn_u:2921: yan nv aham itaś cāsanān nottiṣṭheyam /
S04vimkn_u:2924: akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ mahāparṣadi niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānam,
S04vimkn_u:2925: api tāni padmāni yāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti satvānām,
S04vimkn_u:2926_0: api tāni trīṇi ratnamayāni sopānāni yāni jambūdvīpam upādāya trayastriṃśadbhavanam
S04vimkn_u:2926_1: abhyudgatāni yaiḥ sopānair devās trayastriṃśato jambūdvīpam avataranty akṣobhyaṃ
S04vimkn_u:2926_2: tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāyai paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya jāmbudvīpakāś ca manuṣyās

S04vimkn_u:2927_1: bhārgavacakram iva paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā puṣpadāmam ivādāyemāṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayeyam /
S04vimkn_u:2929: Vkn 11.5 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhim samāpannaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2930: tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yas tam abhiratiṃ lokadhatuṃ paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāninā gṛhītvemaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:2931: Vkn 11.6 tatra ye divyacakṣuṣo 'bhijñāpratilabdhāḥ śrāvakā bodhisatvā devamanuṣyāś ca,
S04vimkn_u:2936: na mamātra vṛṣabhitā vimalakīrtinā bodhisatvena kriyamāṇānām /
S04vimkn_u:2938: te na jānanti na paśyanti ḥ kuto vayaṃ kriyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2939: na hy abhiratyā lokadhātor imaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśitāyā ūnatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2940: na cāsya lokadhātor utpīḍo na saṃbādhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2943: Vkn 11.7 atha bhagavāñ śākyamunis tāṃ sarvāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2944: paśyata mārṣāḥ abhiratiṃ lokadhātum akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgatam etāṃś ca kṣetravyūhāñ śrāvakavyūhān bodhisatvavyūhāṃś ca /
S04vimkn_u:2946: āha: īdṛśaṃ mārsāḥ buddhakṣetraṃ parigrahītukāmena bodhisatvenākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhisatvacaryāyām anuśikṣitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2947_1: saṃdarśane 'smin sahe lokadhātau caturdaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2948: sarvaiś cābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānam utpāditam upapattaye /

S04vimkn_u:2951: Vkn 11.8 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2952: dṛṣṭā te śāriputra abhiratir lokadhātuḥ sa cākṣobhyas tathagataḥ /

S04vimkn_u:2957: ye vayam īdṛśān satpuruṣān labhāmahe darśanāya /
